title: Ammo Reservation Potion
summaries: The Ammo Reservation Potion is a buff potion which grants the Ammo Reservation buff when consumed. The buff reduces the chance of consuming any ammunition by 20%. This lasts for 8 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).

statistics.Tooltip: 20% chance to not consume ammo
statistics.Sell: 2
